input.sentences: our party last night was really fun .
we had so many of our friends over .
we had a great time talking and laughing .
us guys had a great chance to talk and catch up .

output.sentences: The couple had fun that night at the party.
They spent the time talking and laughing with each other.
The guys took a chance away from the girls to talk to each other.
Night time fell and several fell asleep at the party.
